body:
Hi Raha,


I am sure that there are many options, but I would recommend to look at the gphoto2 project. It offers you command-line tools to set the capture properties, acquire images and transfer them to an attached computer. If these are called e.g. by crond you have a nice automated monitoring system.


Cheers,
Lars.
